h1_title: How to Claim Deluxe Edition Items
h2_title: Claiming Deluxe Edition Items in Black Myth: Wukong
content: If you're just starting up the game for the first time with the Deluxe Edition or the upgrade from Standard Edition to Deluxe, simply start the game and  through the first section of Chapter 1's Forest of the Wolves.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Claim_Deluxe_Edition_Items.md', within the main section titled 'How to Claim Deluxe Edition Items', specifically from the subsection 'Claiming Deluxe Edition Items in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
If you're just starting up the game for the first time with the Deluxe Edition or the upgrade from Standard Edition to Deluxe, simply start the game and  through the first section of Chapter 1's Forest of the Wolves.
